desc_short: Boost ATK by 30%, HP and DEF by 10%
Augmente l'ATT de 30%, la PV et la DEF de 10%
Erhöht ANG um 30%, LP und ABW um 10%.
Aumenta ATQ un 30%, VIT y DEF un 10%
desc_long: Boosts ATK by 30%, HP and DEF by 10%.
Augmente l'ATT de 30%, la PV et la DEF de 10%
Erhöht ANG um 30%, LP und ABW um 10%.
Aumenta el ATQ un 30%, la VIT y la DEF un 10%.
